name: Youtube.com - Perfect Presentation Format
description:
This is an edit to "youtube.com - Video Only (Winter 2007)" by war59312.


The changes that I made were...

         -Black background added
         -Title color changed from black to white
         -Size of video changed from 640x480 to 832x624
         -Changed margins for centering the video
         -Remove ad at top of page (updated 11/25)

NOTE: This style is viewed better if your Internet browser is at full screen (F11 on keyboard)

For the original style made by war59312 go to http://userstyles.org/styles/4051

Go here for a larger screenshot: http://i225.photobucket.com/albums/dd169/Skylark95/Other/Userstyles.png
